list.title: Access to the main online stores in the United States
list.content: Have direct access to the main online shopping stores, and send your purchases directly to your International P.O. Box address in the USA.

list.title: Package Consolidation
list.content: Acquire care, repacking and consolidation services for parcels and freight, and save up to 80% with shipment consolidation.

list.title: Customs clearance service
list.content: Maintain a customs broker and fulfillment service that processes export paperwork for you.

list.title: Package tracking Notification
list.content: Keep track of your goods in our real-time product tracking status.

list.title: Easy Registration
list.content: Register and get your US shipping address in seconds.

list.title: Air and Ocean Shipments Every Week
list.content: Ship directly to Venezuela, Latin America or any country in the world, with weekly departures.

list.title: Delivery to your home
list.content: Receive your packages and freight in the comfort of your home, business or office, as well as at the shipping agent's office closest to your home.

list.title: Tailored Freight Forwarding to Meet Your Needs
list.content: Send, with unlimited capacity, documents, packages, goods or cargo of various shapes, weights and sizes by air or sea.
